## How it Works
Docling KB runs as an External Application (ExApp) with an embedded AI: - **Docling** for intelligent document parsing - **ChromaDB** for vector search - **Embedded LLM** for chat (no Ollama needed!) - Everything runs in a single Docker container
## Requirements
- Nextcloud 28 or higher - AppAPI app installed and configured - 4GB+ RAM recommended
